org.usb4java.javax.descriptors

Class SimpleUsbStringDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usb4java.javax.descriptors.SimpleUsbDescriptor
      • org.usb4java.javax.descriptors.SimpleUsbStringDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.usb.UsbDescriptor, javax.usb.UsbStringDescriptor

    public final class SimpleUsbStringDescriptor
extends SimpleUsbDescriptor
implements javax.usb.UsbStringDescriptor
    Simple string descriptor.
    Author:
    Klaus Reimer (k@ailis.de)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • SimpleUsbStringDescriptor

        public SimpleUsbStringDescriptor(byte bLength,
                                 byte bDescriptorType,
                                 String string)
                          throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Constructs a new string descriptor with the specified data.
        Parameters:
        bLength - The descriptor length.
        bDescriptorType - The descriptor type.
        string - The string.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - When system does not support UTF-16LE encoding.

        Parameters:
        descriptor - The descriptor from which to copy the data.
